product_name: REI Snowy Creek Fleece Mittens - Toddlers' - 2012 Overstock
long_description: Made of soft polyester fleece, the REI Snowy Creek fleece mittens keep toddlers' fingers warm during fall and winter outings. Fleece dries quickly and provides light insulation even when damp. Polyester lining is soft and comfortable. Elastic and cinch straps at wrists help seal in warmth. Overstock.
short_description: Made of soft polyester fleece, the REI Snowy Creek fleece mittens keep toddlers' fingers warm during fall and winter outings.
